name: OddBaseballFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Odd Baseball Facts”
”Alexa, tell Odd Baseball Facts to tell me a baseball fact”
”Alexa, ask Odd Baseball Facts to give me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: odd baseball facts
des: Let Alexa tell you some odd facts from the history of baseball that you have probably never heard before! Ask Alexa to start Odd Baseball Facts and she will tell you some of the strange historical facts from America's pastime! This skill is not endorsed or sponsored by MLB.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
